snippet.title: BLOOD PURGE: RELEASEBURG - ANNOUNCEMENT TRAILER
snippet.description:
Welcome to Blood Purge: Releaseburg, a rogue-like game set in a post-apocalyptic city overrun by hordes of zombies. With the exceptional release-based shooting mechanic, every encounter becomes a thrilling test of precision and strategy.

Wishlist Blood Purge: Releaseburg: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2717150/Blood_Purge_Releaseburg/

Follow SteadyBoar on Social Media:
Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/steadyboar
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@steadyboar807

Timecodes
0:00 - Intro
0:14 - City
0:28 - Gameplay
0:52  -Title 

#roguelike #indiegame #gaming #gamedev #indiedev #roguelite #unity #videogames #games #indiegames #indiegamedev #gamer #steam #gamedesign #videogame #madewithunity #gamedevelopment #indiegamedeveloper 

About me:
I'm Steady, an indie game developer with a deep passion for soulslike and roguelike games. My journey into game development is fueled by a love for challenging gameplay and focus on creating unique and memorable experiences.
